languages.text: "И чувства, что есть между вами. Они, возможно, превыше всего остального. Мог ли я не дать им случиться, удушить, пока они были слабы? Мог. Но не стал".

"And the feelings that exist between you. Those supersede all else, perhaps. Could I have prevented them from springing up? Smothered them while they were still weak? I could have. But I chose not to."
languages.original_text: "И чувства, что есть между вами. Они, возможно, превыше всего остального. Мог ли я не дать им случиться, удушить, пока они были слабы? Мог. Но не стал".

traits.locale_text: "And the feelings that exist between you. Perhaps those supersede all else. Could I have prevented them from springing up? Smothered them while they were still weak? I could have. But I chose not to."

"And the feelings that exist between you. Perhaps those supersede all else. Could I have prevented them from springing up? Smothered them while they were still weak? I could have. But I chose not to."

"And the feelings that exist between you. Those supersede all else, perhaps. Could I have prevented them from springing up? Smothered them while they were still weak? I could have. But I chose not to."

languages.text: « Moi, et les sentiments qui sont nés entre vous, plus encore que toute autre chose, peut-être. Aurais-je pu les empêcher de voir le jour ? Les étouffer dans l'œuf avant qu'ils ne deviennent trop puissants ? Sans doute, mais j'ai choisi de n'en rien faire. »
languages.original_text: "And the feelings that exist between you. Those supersede all else, perhaps. Could I have prevented them from springing up? Smothered them while they were still weak? I could have. But I chose not to."

traits.locale_text: « Moi, et les sentiments qui sont nés entre vous, plus encore que toute autre chose, peut-être. Aurais-je pu les empêcher de voir le jour ? Les étouffer dans l'œuf avant qu'ils ne deviennent trop puissants ? Sans doute, mais j'ai choisi de n'en rien faire. »

languages.text: «Y los sentimientos que han aflorado entre ustedes... Tal vez estén por encima de todo lo demás. ¿Podría haber evitado que afloraran? ¿Reducirlos a la nada mientras eran débiles? Sin duda. Pero preferí no hacerlo».
languages.original_text: "And the feelings that exist between you. Those supersede all else, perhaps. Could I have prevented them from springing up? Smothered them while they were still weak? I could have. But I chose not to."

traits.locale_text: «Y los sentimientos que han aflorado entre ustedes... Tal vez estén por encima de todo lo demás. ¿Podría haber evitado que afloraran? ¿Reducirlos a la nada mientras eran débiles? Sin duda. Pero preferí no hacerlo».

languages.text: 「そして、あなた達の間に生まれた感情。それはおそらく他の何よりも優先されるもの。私にその感情の芽を摘めただろうか？まだ小さなうちに枯らせることができただろうか？できたかもしれない。でも私はそうしないことを選んだ」
languages.original_text: "And the feelings that exist between you. Those supersede all else, perhaps. Could I have prevented them from springing up? Smothered them while they were still weak? I could have. But I chose not to."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、あなた達の間に生まれた感情。それはおそらく他の何よりも優先されるもの。私にその感情の芽を摘めただろうか？まだ小さなうちに枯らせることができただろうか？できたかもしれない。でも私はそうしないことを選んだ」

languages.text: “更不用提你们之间的感情，或许她的感情会凌驾于一切之上。我该不该阻止你们的感情发芽？该不该趁这株幼苗柔弱不堪的时候将其扼杀？我本可以这么做，但我选择了另一条路。”
languages.original_text: "And the feelings that exist between you. Those supersede all else, perhaps. Could I have prevented them from springing up? Smothered them while they were still weak? I could have. But I chose not to."

traits.locale_text: “更不用提你们之间的感情，或许她的感情会凌驾于一切之上。我该不该阻止你们的感情发芽？该不该趁这株幼苗柔弱不堪的时候将其扼杀？我本可以这么做，但我选择了另一条路。”

languages.text: "Und die Gefühle, die zwischen Euch bestehen. Sie übersteigen vielleicht alles andere. Hätte ich verhindern können, dass sie sich entwickeln? Sie ersticken, als sie noch schwach waren? Ich hätte es tun können. Doch ich habe mich dagegen entschieden."
languages.original_text: "And the feelings that exist between you. Those supersede all else, perhaps. Could I have prevented them from springing up? Smothered them while they were still weak? I could have. But I chose not to."

traits.locale_text: "Und die Gefühle, die zwischen Euch bestehen. Sie übersteigen vielleicht alles andere. Hätte ich verhindern können, dass sie sich entwickeln? Sie ersticken, als sie noch schwach waren? Ich hätte es tun können. Doch ich habe mich dagegen entschieden."

languages.text: "Aranızda var olan hislere gelecek olursak o hisler, belki de geri kalan her şeyin önüne geçti. Bu hislerin gelişmesini engelleyebilir miydim? Daha yeni başlamışken onları kontrol altına alabilir miydim? Yapabilirdim ama yapmamayı seçtim."
languages.original_text: "And the feelings that exist between you. Those supersede all else, perhaps. Could I have prevented them from springing up? Smothered them while they were still weak? I could have. But I chose not to."
